## OrderByDirection type

The direction of a [orderBy()](./firestore_.orderby.md) clause is specified as 'desc' or 'asc' (descending or ascending).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type OrderByDirection = 'desc' | 'asc';
```
